userManagement.created: A new user is created with identifier {{ param }}
userManagement.updated: A user is updated with identifier {{ param }}
userManagement.deleted: A user is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete user {{ login }}?

activate.title: Activate Users
activate.description: This will activate {{ count }} selected users.

deactivate.title: Deactivate Users
deactivate.description: This will deactivate {{ count }} selected users.

changeRole.title: Change User Roles
changeRole.description: This will change the role for {{ count }} selected users.

result.title: Bulk Action Results
result.summary: Successfully processed {{ success }} out of {{ total }} users.

export.title: Export Users
export.includeFilters: Include current search and filter criteria

import.title: Import Users from CSV
import.dragDrop: Drag and drop your CSV file here, or click to select

instructions.title: Import Instructions
instructions.format: CSV file should contain columns: username, email, fullName, role
instructions.duplicates: Duplicate usernames or emails will be skipped
